```{r}
library(igraph)
library(parallel)
library(tictoc)
library(dplyr)

source("src/3-pseudocoloring.R")
source("src/2-coloring.R")
source("src/is_colored_properly.R")
source("src/sum_coloring.R")
source("src/27_26-approximate-coloring.R")
source("src/brute_force.R")
source("src/test0.R")

path <- 'test1/0430/'

c <- c(1,2,3,4)
n <- 8

probe <- 20000

if (!dir.exists(path))
  dir.create(path)

df <- data.frame()

Sys.time()
tic(paste0('test: ', path))

for(i in 1:probe) {
  p <- sample(c(0.4, 0.5, 0.6, 0.7, 0.8, 0.9), 1)
  graph <- sample_bipartite(n/2, n/2, p=p)
  V(graph)$weight <- sample(c(1,2,6,24), n, replace = TRUE)
  V(graph)$name <- letters[1:n]

  if(test0(graph)) {
    twoColoring <- two_coloring(graph)
    V(graph)[twoColoring[[1]]]$color <- c[1]
    V(graph)[twoColoring[[2]]]$color <- c[2]
    sum <- sum_coloring(graph, c)
    graph$approximated <- sum
    graph$optimal <- sum
  
    df <- rbind(df, data.frame(list(
      index = i, 
      approximated = graph$approximated, 
      optimal = graph$optimal, 
      ratio = graph$approximated / graph$optimal, 
      colors = length(unique(V(graph)$color)), 
      vertices = paste(V(graph)$weight, collapse=','), 
      degres = paste(degree(graph), collapse = ','),
      test0 = TRUE
    )))
  
    write_graph(graph, paste0(path, i , '.graphml'), "graphml")
  
    next;
  }
  
  parts <- decompose(graph)
  sumA <- 0
  sumB <- 0

  for(k in 1:length(parts)) {
    resultA <- four_coloring(parts[[k]], c)
    V(graph)[V(resultA[[1]])$name]$color <- V(resultA[[1]])$color
    sumA <- sumA + resultA[[2]]
  }

  resultB <- brute_force(graph, c, sumA)
  V(graph)$color2 <- V(resultB[[1]])$color
  sumB <- resultB[[2]]

  graph$approximated = sumA
  graph$optimal = sumB

  df <- rbind(df, data.frame(list(
    index = i, 
    approximated = graph$approximated, 
    optimal = graph$optimal, 
    ratio = graph$approximated / graph$optimal,  
    colors = length(unique(V(graph)$color)), 
    vertices = paste(V(graph)$weight, collapse=','), 
    degres = paste(degree(graph), collapse = ','),
    test0 = FALSE
  )))

  write_graph(graph, paste0(path, i , '.graphml'), "graphml")
}

toc()
Sys.time()

saveRDS(df, file = paste0(path, 'data.rds'))

df
```
